uk.azdev.openfire.net.messages

Interface IMessage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInvitationResponseMessage, AcceptInvitationMessage, ClientConfigurationMessage, ClientInformationMessage, ClientVersionMessage, DIdMessage, FriendGameInfoMessage, FriendListMessage, FriendOfFriendListMessage, FriendStatusMessage, FriendVoiceCommsInfoMessage, ChatMessage, IncomingInvitationMessage, Int8MapBasedMessage, KeepaliveMessage, LoginFailureMessage, LoginChallengeMessage, LoginRequestMessage, LoginSuccessMessage, MapBasedMessage, NewVersionAvailableMessage, OnlineFriendsRequest, OutgoingInvitationMessage, RejectInvitationMessage, ServerRoutedChatMessage, StringMapBasedMessage, UnknownInt8MapBasedMessage, UnknownStringMapBasedMessage, UserSessionIdListMessage

    public interface IMessage
    Represents an abstracted message type that can be sent or received. Implementors of this interface will typically provide message-specific interfaces to make construction and analysis of messages easier.
    Author:
    Iain

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getMessageContentSize()
      Determines the size of the message as it would appear on a binary stream.

      Creates a raw message for transmission.
